702135f-a.text:
Westchester Square (East Tremont Ave.), east side, north from but
not including Fink to Roberts Aves.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
702135f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702134f-a.text:
Westchester Square, on the north side of Westchester Avenue, at E. Tremont Avenue, showing the Westchester Square branch of the New York Public Library. The wing is a comfort station.
August 15, 1940
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
702134f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702134f-b.text:
Westchester Square, on the north side of Westchester Avenue, at E. Tremont Avenue, showing the Westchester Square branch of the New York Public Library. The wing is a comfort station.
August 15, 1940
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
702134f-b.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702128f-b.text:
(1)
Intersection of Westchester Ave. (left) and Tremont Ave. (East), showing the frame houses on the eastern end of Westchester Square. The view is in an easterly direction and shows part of the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park Subway line.

July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same at a later date, from a slightly different angle.

August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
702128f-b.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702129f-a.text:
Westchester Avenue, south side, east of E. Tremont Avenue, near Westchester Creek.

702129f-a.folder: Westchester Avenue & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY

702140f-b.title: Bronx: Westchester Square - Westchester Avenue
702140f-b.text:
(1)
94 and 96 Westchester Square (East Tremont Ave.), at, and adjoining its eastern intersection with Westchester Ave. The G. W. Bromley map of 1927 shows these houses to be actually on East Tremont Ave., but bearing the above indicated addresses.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, showing a more extensive view east on Tremont Ave. On the left appears a portion of the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Pelham Bay Park subway line.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
702140f-b.folder: Westchester Square & Westchester Avenue, Bronx, NY
